doc:
Michael Paul Chan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Paul_Chan 0 Michael Paul Chan (born June 26, 1950) is an American television and film actor. He is known for his role as Lieutenant Michael Tao on the TNT series The Closer and Major Crimes. He also acted in US Marshals, playing an assassin. Michael_Paul_Chan ( born June_26_,_1950 ) is an_American_television_and_film_actor . He is_known for his_role as Lieutenant_Michael_Tao on the_TNT_series The_Closer_and_Major_Crimes . He also acted in US_Marshals , playing an_assassin .
